medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain with associated nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began midday yesterday after lunch with upper right quadrant pain. Antacid provided some relief initially. Later in the evening, the patient experienced crampy pain across the upper abdomen, worsened nausea, and vomiting. Following a normal brown bowel movement last night, the abdominal pain worsened.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Urinary tract infection, arthritis, history of MRSA, bilateral hip open reduction and internal fixation, tonsillectomy.
medical_history.family_history: Father with diabetes mellitus, mother with arthritis.
